instructions.display_text: Add water, salt and rice to a 2-quart saucepan; stir. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low. Cover; cook 22-24 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Meanwhile, coat sliced beef with seasoning in shallow bowl or plastic bag.
Heat oil in 10-inch non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Carefully add beef and peppers; cook 6 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens.
Top rice with beef and peppers; drizzle with Korean BBQ Sauce. Sprinkle with optional toppings if desired. Enjoy!

ingredient.name: Tasty™ Chicken Tikka Masala Dinner Kit

components.raw_text: Tasty™ Chicken Tikka Masala Dinner Kit
1 Lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts cut in ½-inch cubes
½ cup heavy cream or milk

instructions.display_text: Add water, salt and rice to a 2-quart saucepan; stir. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low. Cover; cook 22-24 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Meanwhile, coat chicken pieces with seasoning in shallow bowl or plastic bag.
Heat oil in 10-inch non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Carefully add chicken and onions; cook 7 to 9 minutes, stirring frequently, until thoroughly cooked.
Reduce heat to low. Stir in Tikka Masala sauce and cream; cook 1-2 minutes until cooked through.
Serve chicken and onions with rice. Sprinkle with optional toppings if desired. Enjoy!

components.raw_text: Tasty™ Creamy Tuscan Chicken Dinner Kit
4 cups, loosely packed, Fresh Spinach (about 2 oz)

results.name: Creamy Tuscan Chicken Dinner Kit
results.description: Tuscan chicken is the ultimate comfort food, and the beauty of this family friendly dish is that it comes together so quickly! Tasty dinner kits are now available in stores.

instructions.display_text: Fill a 2-quart saucepan two-thirds full of water. Heat to boiling.
Add pasta; stir. Boil gently 12 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain; set aside.
Meanwhile, cut chicken breasts at an angle, into ½-inch medallions.
Coat chicken with seasoning in shallow bowl or plastic bag.
Heat butter in 10-inch non-stick skillet over medium heat; carefully add chicken and any excess seasoning. Cook medallions 4 to 5 minutes on each side, until browned.
Stir in milk; heat to boiling.
Reduce heat to medium-low, stir in spinach, and sundried tomatoes if using. Simmer 5 minutes.
Stir in Creamy Garlic Already sauce.
Top pasta with chicken and sauce. Sprinkle with optional toppings if desired. Enjoy!

results.seo_title: Tasty Creamy Tuscan Chicken Dinner Kit
